title: BIOLOGICAL ACTIVITY OF COMPOUNDS OF PLANT ORIGIN
author: Szöke; Éva; Kéry; Ágnes; Lemberkovics
description: Due to their structural diversity and specific biological effects, natural substances play an important role in medication. Many of the medicines used today were originally discovered as the active ingredients in herbs. A substantial proportion of the remedies...
cleaned_text: Abstract Due to their structural diversity and specific biological effects, natural substances play an important role in medication. Many of the medicines used today were originally discovered as the active ingredients in herbs. A substantial proportion of the remedies applied nowadays in human therapy are natural drug molecules or semi-synthetics of natural origin.
